meanings.definition: A hard metamorphic rock consisting mainly of quartz.
meanings.sent1: The quartzite sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The miners extracted quartzite from the quarry.
meanings.sent3: The quartzite decided to throw a party for all the other rocks.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as solid as quartzite.
meanings.sent5: The quartzite walls stood tall and strong against the storm.

meanings.definition: A type of stone used for building materials.
meanings.sent1: The construction crew chose quartzite for the foundation.
meanings.sent2: The architect admired the beauty of the quartzite columns.
meanings.sent3: The quartzite stone rolled down the hill, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: His words were as unyielding as quartzite.
meanings.sent5: The quartzite pathway led to a hidden garden.
